nodes.text: A battle took place near the planet of Chommell Minor between the newly- formed Bravo Squadron and a group of pirates. Ric Olié took part in the battle in his new N-1 starfighter, Bravo 1. Sate Pestage quipped that several of the pirates collided with one another.
This battle was mentioned in 2012's Darth Plagueis, which was written by James Luceno.
